name: Turkey Quesadillas
description: An easy, delicious way to transform turkey leftovers into another crowd-pleasing meal.

ingredients.name: grated Monterey Jack or cheddar cheese

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400 °F (205 °C).
  2. Combine turkey, peppers, cheese and Fajita Seasoning.
  3. Place half the tortillas on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Divide filling among tortillas. Top each with second tortilla.
  4. Bake 8 minutes, turn over and bake an additional 8 minutes, or until lightly golden and cheese is melted.
tips: Serve with prepared Epicure Poco Picante Salsa, Epicure Guacamole and sour cream.
